thread.title: Facebook Will Now Warn You if Government Tries to Hack Your Account
thread.title_full: Facebook Will Now Warn You if Government Tries to Hack Your Account

title: Facebook Will Now Warn You if Government Tries to Hack Your Account
text:
22 Facebook Will Now Warn You if Government Tries to Hack Your Account 
Nextgov: Facebook will begin notifying users when it suspects a state-affiliated entity has attempted to hack into their account, Chief Security Officer Alex Stamos wrote a blog post on Oct. 17.
